articles.author: Greg Norman
articles.title: Horse running wild on train platform caught on video - Fox News
articles.description: A strange video has captured a horse running around on a train platform in a suburb of Sydney, Australia, as a train rolled into the station.
articles.content:
A bizarre video has captured a horse running around on a train platform in an incident that officials are describing as a "bit of horseplay." 
Surveillance footage shared this week by Transport for … [+1582 chars]

articles.title: Top total solar eclipses to look out for over the next decade - Space.com
